page.title: 11INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {Mrs. Pritchard}is St.Anne's school governor. She attends all the school activities and has never missed a meeting. She also is on the Wyre Forest District Council, and sits on other committees too numerous to mention. She was{Mayoress of Bewdley 1934-41 and 1949-50. In 1964 she was awarded the{M.B.E.}for service to the community. What is interesting about her is her age. She has never disclosed it, not even to the press or close friends but we think she is over 95. This year she will retire from the board of governors after{50}years of service. The tragedy in her life was the wounding of her husband in the last month of World War I, which left him crippled until his death. Mrs Pritchard carried on his dedication to local community work.
